snippet.title: Jump Ship - Official Gameplay Explainer Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1757300/Jump_Ship/

Jump Ship is a mission based co-op FPS for up to 4 players, where you are the crew of a spaceship. Transition seamlessly from crewing the ship to on-foot exploration and space walks. Engage in intense battles both on the ground and in space, and always keep your ship upgraded and intact. Teamwork is key for survival and victory.

We love co-op games, and we love space. Jump Ship is our attempt to make both work together.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/KeepsakeGames
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/jwY5bpkbm8
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1757300/Jump_Ship/
Web: https://jumpshipgame.com
